sellerCard.oneLiner: Top Rated WordPress Website Developer, Website Designer
sellerCard.description:
Serving the Fiverr Community for 10+ Years.

I am a professional and experienced WordPress website designer and developer. I have more than 10 years of experience and have developed 1000s of websites for clients around the globe. As you can see, I have 1000s of positive reviews on Fiverr and am able to develop and design any kind of website you may require. Letâ€™s work together, take your business to the next level, and the world-wide web.

description.content:
If you are looking for high quality WordPress website that can make your business standout from others, increase your business value and sales then you are at right place. With 10+ years experience, 2000+ happy customers on Fiverr & excellent reviews i would be your trusted developer. 


Happy to do zoom meeting for easy project discussion.


I provide:


  • Responsive (Desktop, Tablets & Smart Phones)
  • Fast Loading Speed
  • Wordpress Themes & Plugins Installation
  • Sliders, Stock Graphics & Animations
  • Fully Secure with Wordpress Security Plugins
  • Social Media Integration
  • Smart Navigation
  • SEO Ready for better search results in Google
  • Contact Forms, Google Maps Integration
  • Newsletter & Optins Integration (Inline, Popups)
  • Elementor, Elementor Pro, Visual Composer compatible for easy editing
  • Backup & Migrations
  • Unlimited Revisions, Ongoing Support
  • Google Analytics & Facebook pixel integration
  • Performance Optimization


Types of Websites I develop/design: 


  • Personal or Brand
  • Ecommerce
  • Business & Enterprise
  • Landing Page
  • Digital Agencies
  • Photography
  • Authors or Publishers
  • Health & Fitness
  • Education
  • Real Estate
  • Non Profit Organizations
  • Directory & Social News
  • Portfolio
  • Blog
  • & many more

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do i require before placing order?
questionsAndAnswers.answer:
You would need to have 

Hosting or WordPress Login 

Content 
if you need content i can provide. That will cost $100 extra 

Ecommerce> Product images with prices

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can we do live video/audio chat to discuss my requirements or feedback
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes i am available for meeting so requirements/feedback can be discussed easily. Its done through Zoom Meetings.

questionsAndAnswers.question: After website is complete what services you will provide?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I will provide complete assistance and future changes without any cost. I would be available instantly once you message me with any changes or updates you want so i can do that.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Would you give me login so i can manage website myself?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes you would be able to manage website yourself. I will provide you complete backend access that will allow you to manage your website easily. I will also provide you basic wordpress tutorials on how to update your website easily.

questionsAndAnswers.question: If i need a website similar to other site what should i do?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: For that just provide me that website url that you want to make your site similar i will check it and let you know more details.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What about backups and hosting management?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I do complete auto backup system on your hosting as well as within wordpress website so you can easily restore whenever you need to.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide seo services as part of website development/design?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes all websites i do are seo optimized. I will do various seo tasks to boost your website seo score.

milestones.title: Requirements
milestones.description: We'll make sure I have everything needed to complete your project.

steps.title: Planning
steps.description: I'll use your provided requirements to start planning your website.

steps.title: Specifications
steps.description: I'll write the specifications for your site's functionality and features.

milestones.title: Website Design
milestones.description: I'll create the design for your website.

steps.title: Design Concept
steps.description: I'll design a concept for your website.

steps.title: First draft
steps.description: I'll prepare a first draft of the delivery.

steps.title: Progress check
steps.description: We'll meet to review your project status and the steps needed to finish it.

milestones.title: Development
milestones.description: I'll develop the website and deliver a working product for your review.

milestones.title: Content & Delivery
milestones.description: I'll complete the website for delivery.

steps.title: Content Upload
steps.description: I'll upload your content (copy, images, videos, etc.) to your website.

steps.title: Delivery
steps.description: I'll send you the final delivery for review and feedback.

milestones.title: Modifications
milestones.description: I'll modify assets based on your feedback.

steps.title: Final Design
steps.description: I'll deliver the final website design for your approval.

reviews.comment: Usman was incredible to work with, he understood what I was trying to accomplish, and carried the messaging and the brand throughout the website! I briefly shared a vision, and he far exceeded my expectations, and created a beautiful, dynamic website, that I am proud to share and show off! I highly recommend working with Usman!!
This is the first time requesting services to build a website, it was smooth, easy to collaborate and he proved very knowledgeable. I highlight appreciate Usman's work on this.

Usman Bashir delivered an EXCEPTIONAL WordPress landing page for my law firm, going above and beyond with meticulous documentation and a flawless, bug-free execution. Working with him was a pleasure; his deep understanding and excellent communication skills made the collaboration effortless. Highly recommended for anyone needing top-notch website development! ðŸ‘
Always respond in a timely manner quick with  adjustments when I need the website edited and was always professional. Thank you Usman!

Usman Bashir did an OUTSTANDING job in website development! His attention to detail, thorough documentation, and professionalism truly impressed me, and he even went above and beyond to deliver on time with such politeness. Highly recommend working with him ðŸ‘!

enriched_details.name: Triforce Digital Marketing
enriched_details.description: Triforce Digital Marketing is the secret to your future online success. As a full-service digital marketing agency in Dallas, we specialize in providing data-driven and cutting-edge digital marketing strategies that get you real results.

notableClients.name: Social Avenue Platform
notableClients.interaction_description:
Design/development of website for digital marketing agency that involves in Brand Agency, General Press, Influencer and
Careers. Website was done using WordPress with custom theme and premium plugin integration.

enriched_details.name: Social Avenue Platform
enriched_details.description: We live and breathe social media and digital marketing! Social Avenue Platform is so much more than just any social media and marketing agency.

notableClients.name: Yema Essentials
notableClients.interaction_description: Ecommerce website design/development for hair lash brand Yema Essentials. Website was done using WordPress and Woocommerce with complete ecommerce backend management.

enriched_details.name: Yema S. Essentials
enriched_details.description: Yema S. Essentials is THE Beauty Brand that embodies class, style, elegance, and beauty with every woman around the world in mind! We are committed to providing exceptional customer service, spreading confidence, and assisting you, our friends, with your beauty needs.
